title: Universe/Geometry/Azimuth
description: Azimuth [rad] of a frame point from a ground station point/axes observer (by default the same name is used for the observation point and axes in frame system, e.g. ground station point).

target.description: Target of the observation, a point in the frames system

observer.description: Observer of the observation, this name must be a point and an axes in the frames system

axes.description: Axes in which the observation is made, an Axes in the frames system (default, same as observer)
